**Health Care in world**
Stat of Health care service of all country from 1960 to 2015.Data is taken from world bank
report. Input > Detail of code > <https://github.com/BkrmDahal/World_Bank_Data_Mining_Series> 
and my blog <https://r-python.blogspot.com>


```{r, echo=F}
##load required package
require("dplyr")
library(googleVis)
op <- options(gvis.plot.tag='chart')


# Import BOB and change date string to date
setwd("E:/R_Script")
filepath=getwd()
setwd(paste(filepath, "Input", sep="/"))

bob=read.csv("Health, Health services .csv")
bob$years=as.Date(bob$years, "%Y-%m-%d")

M = gvisMotionChart(bob, idvar = "Country.Name", timevar = "years", colorvar = "Region",
                    options = list(width = 700, height = 600), chartid= "country_gdp")
plot(M)
```
